content: Great to read this. I was planning my next article to be on a related topic — the value of volunteering your time in the space that you work. This is a great compliment to that. We give away some of our materials on our website and have also done even more of that through some recent articles. Lots of value to be gained by giving some (or a lot) away for free. I’m checking out the course from Sean McCabe, too! Thanks for sharing it.
